::Shredder::

Shredder's systems wake up from sleep mode as they recieve the message, scrolling it before his optics as he awakes. He blinks, reading and clambering to his feet.

"Better than nothing," he says, stretching and then flying up, heading quickly for the given coordinates.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Shredder. He sensed his precense on a planet. A worthy Destron warrior. He 
> was sure he had made himself another group. He sent him a typed message like 
> the rest. "Shredder. Hello you  may know of me from stories old and new. I 
> will fully reveal myself to you if or when we meet. I wish to meet you at 
> this coordinates. (A mountain near his bade) I hope your curiosaty helps and 
> I look forward to your reply. I may some great use to you in the future." The 
> dark bot walked along his base. The time wasnt almost here.
